summary:
Have you ever wanted to just spawn a load of enemy NPCS right in the middle of town?
If your attacking a bandit camp or fort you can spawn some imperial soldiers to fight 
your battles. A dragon attacks why don\'t you spawn a legion of archer to bring it down?
Create your own huge battles right now!!
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About - Skyrim Battle Scripts
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Have you ever wanted to just spawn a load of enemies right in the middle of town?
If your attacking a bandit camp or fort you can spawn some imperial soldiers to fight
your battles. A dragon attacks why don\'t you spawn a legion of archer to bring it down?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update V2.1
Vampires now added
Support for Dawnguard Improved
Fixed Some Compatibility Issues
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NPS Included In This Release Version 2.0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(((((((EVERY SINGLE ID IN SKYRIM IS NOW INCLUDED IN VERSION 2.0 YOU DONT NEED
ME ANYMORE CREATE YOUR OWN BATTLES YOU HAVE ALL THE IDS AND THE KNOWLEDGE TO DO SO
GOOD LUCK))))))
The idea behind me giving you guys every ID in game is so that i dont have to update
skyrim battle scripts anymore you have every single ID in the game here. All you need
to do is open this with notepad use the find tab and search for the character or creature
your wanting to spawn grab the ID from this list then make your own .txt file and type

\"player.placeatme (ID CODE) (Amount)\"


Save the file in skyrim/data folder


You can now create your own battles without my help.

What ever you have called the file in game just bring up the console and 
type Bat Your
\"FileName\"

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING AND GET SPAWNING SOME EPIC BATTLE


BY ASSASSIN9500


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.9
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thalmor Soldier
Thalmor Mages
Imperial Solider
Imperial Archer
Imperial Mage
Imperial General
Stormcloak Solider
Stormcloak Archer
Stormcloak Mage
Stormcloak General

Frost Atronach

Storm Atronach

Frost Troll
Elk
Bears
Town Guards
Jarls
Cattle
Chickens
(((All Game IDS are in the text file included
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates: None planned every ID in game is now included in the
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install Instructions
Place the .TXT files into - The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall Instruction
Just Delete The Text Files - The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How To Use - Open the console with ~ and Type the following
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Scripts
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type- \"Bat Thalmor\" - Summons Thalmor Mages And Soldiers (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Storm\" - Summons StormCloak Group (Neutral)
Type- \"Bat Imperial\" - Summons Imperial allies (Allies)
Type- \"Bat Bandit\" Summon Bandit Group (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Myself\" Summon Yourself To Battle (Allies)
Type- \"Bat Dragon\" Summons A Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Priest\" Summons a Dragon Priest (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat BloodDragon\" Summons Blood Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat SkeletonDragon\" Summons Skeleton Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat AncientDragon\" Summons Ancient Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Mammoth\" Summons a Mammoth (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat ElderDragon\" Summons a Elder Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat FrostDragon\" Summons a Frost Dragon (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Chaurus\" Summons a Chaurus (Scorpion) (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Draugr\" Summons a Draugr Soldier (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Frostspider\" Summons a Frostbite Spider  (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat IceWraith\" Summons a Ice Wraith (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Wolf\" Summons a Wolf (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Horse\" Summons a Horse  (Allies)
Type- \"Bat Skeever\" Summons a Skeever (Rat) (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat SnowCat\" Summons a Snowy Saber Cat (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Woodelf\" Summons a Wood-Elf (Neutral)
Type- \"Bat Vampires\" Summons Vampires (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Dremora\" Summomns Dremora Lords (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Giant\" Summons Giants (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat DCenturian\" Summons Dwarven Centurian (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat FrostAtronach\" Summons FrostAtronach (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat FireAtronach\" Summons FireAtronach (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat StormAtronach\" Summons StormAtronach (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Spriggan\" Summons Spriggan (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat FrostTroll\" Summons FrostTroll (Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Elk\" Summons pack of elks(Unknown)
Type- \"Bat Bears\" Summons pack of Bears(Hostile)
Type- \"Bat Guards\" Summons Guards (Unknown)
Type- \"Bat Cattle\" Summons Cattle (Neutral)
Type- \"Bat Jarls\" Summons Jarls (Neutral)
Type- \"Bat Chicken\" Summons Pack of Wild Chickens (Neutral)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How To Despawn Items And Charcter (Cleaning up after the battle)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Its also possible to despawn bodies by opening the console and select the item
and typing disable.(Thanks To Schrii for pointing this out to me) The command will
remove what ever the object is. Warnning make sure you click the right thing
you might end up removing a main character or something.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known Bugs And Issues
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Too many NPS causes skyrim to crash
*NPC may just stand there if too many people are fighting
*Lower your graphics setting if your going to spawn 100s of NPS
*Dragons Can cause  extreme Lag if you spawn too many
*Even if your PC is good the game sometimes just cant handle iteself
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks And Enjoy - Assassin9500
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
